response.overview: An LA detective is murdered because she has microfilm with the recipe to make cocaine cookies. Two cops partner to find and stop the fiends before they can dope the nation by distributing their wares via the 'Wilderness Girls' cookie drive.
response.tagline: Oh my God. They have guns!
response.title: National Lampoon's Loaded Weapon 1

titles.title: ローデッド・ウェポン 1

release_dates.note: New Line Home Video / Columbia/TriStar Home Video #52363 [VHS] 83 minutes
